THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
TELECOMMUNICATIONS CENTER
2470 NORTH STAR ROAD
COLUMBUS 21, OHIO
Richakd B. Hull, Executive Director
November 16, I960
Mr. William Harley
President, NAEB
Suite 119
Dupont Circle Office Building
1346 Connecticut Ave., N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bills
I recently received a letter from Robert L. Davy who is now
with Welton Becket and Associates who are architects and
engineers in San Francisco. I met Davy briefly at the convention
and I went into a complete blank. Although he looks familiar and
X know I have been associated with him at sometime, I cannot
recreate our association. He is applying for a $ob here and lists
WHA as one of his first duties in his experience record (1947-
4S on WHA).
He says now that he has decided "That educational broadcasting is
the place where I can excell and work creatively and satisfyingly
the rest of my professional life." What can you tell me about the
guy?
Sincerely,
Richard B. Hull
RBHsdf
